newsitem.title: USA: Photomatrix seeks merger or combination.
newsitem.headline: Photomatrix seeks merger or combination.

text.p: Photomatrix Inc said Monday it is exploring a merger or strategic combination.

The company, which develops and makes high-performance document and aperture-card scanners, said it needs a capital infusion to achieve critical volume to support its operations and to compete successfully in the document imaging market.

"The Board of Directors and management have concluded that the interests of the shareholders will be best served via a merger or strategic combination," a company statement said. "Accordingly, the company is currently in discussions with potential synergistic candidates to explore such a strategic transaction."
During the past year the company sold its court-reporting business, discontinued its groupware remarketing business and focused on its core imaging business.
